text:
[Verse 1]
Stars above us shine bright
On this midnight walk tonight
Hand in hand we stroll slow
Silent streets only we know

[Verse 2]
Moonlight guides our path clear
Every step you're so near
Chilly breeze whispers stay
In the dark we find our way

[Chorus]
Midnight walk you and me
Underneath the old oak tree
In the shadows hearts align
Hourglass stops keeping time

[Verse 3]
Hidden nooks and quiet alleys
Lost in love's enchanted valleys
Every heartbeat feels so right
In this purest black and white

[Chorus]
Midnight walk you and me
Underneath the old oak tree
In the shadows hearts align
Hourglass stops keeping time

[Bridge]
No need for daylight
Just hold me tight
In this calm serenade
Let's dance in the shade
title: Midnight Walk
